worker-has-eligible-docs.legend: Does the worker have any of these?

person-work-for-you.legend: Does this person already work for you?

start-work-date.legend: When did they start working for you?

use-digital-right-to-work.legend: Are you unable to use a digital Right to Work service due to a technical error?

worker-applied-eu-settlement-scheme.label: Has the worker applied to the EU Settlement Scheme (EUSS)?

yes-certificate-of-application.label: Yes, they have a Certificate of Application issued following submission of an application to the EUSS

yes-evidence-of-settled-status.label: Yes, they have evidence to demonstrate they have settled or pre-settled status under the EUSS issued by a Crown Dependency

no-frontier-worker.label: No, they are a Frontier Worker in the UK

work-for-you-result-of-tupe-transfer.legend: Do they work for you as a result of a TUPE transfer?
work-for-you-result-of-tupe-transfer.hint: TUPE rules protect the employee's rights when the organisation or service they work for is transferred to a new employer

seen-original-document.legend: Have you seen the original document?

worker-has-arc-card.legend: Does the worker have an application registration card (ARC) that shows they have the right to work?
worker-has-arc-card.hint: ARCs are proof of asylum status. The right to work is shown in the Remarks section of the card

arc-number.label: What is the worker’s application registration card number?
arc-number.hint: This is on the back left of the card. For example, ZU1234567

worker-have-ongoing-appeal.legend: Does the worker have an ongoing appeal or application with the Home Office?

worker-been-in-UK-before-1988.legend: Has the worker been in the UK since before 1988?

worker-applied-for-settlement-protection.label: Has the worker applied for, or do they qualify for, settlement protection?

hours-of-work-per-week.label: Hours of work per week
hours-of-work-per-week.hint: If the hours can vary, enter the average from the last 17 weeks or an estimate

contact-email-address.label: Contact email address
contact-email-address.hint: This needs to be the email address of the employer requesting the check
